da583954-4289-44e2-beeb-1c45e4ded76d.name: 战斗反射
da583954-4289-44e2-beeb-1c45e4ded76d.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

09625e74-61af-4fa9-baf6-e28091514882.name: 硬皮
09625e74-61af-4fa9-baf6-e28091514882.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

c299b845-4e01-4869-aa47-88c7550b6b5d.name: 健康
c299b845-4e01-4869-aa47-88c7550b6b5d.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

02a2d7a7-29dc-460f-ad2b-f3b2449ceccd.name: Fit, Very
02a2d7a7-29dc-460f-ad2b-f3b2449ceccd.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

83f62dd8-46eb-469f-a59e-5616e3e116e5.name: 高痛阈
83f62dd8-46eb-469f-a59e-5616e3e116e5.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

28b62082-7ccf-4f6a-8659-0eff0f5252ba.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次
